the fact of borrowing money, especially from a bank, or the amount that is borrowed: Public borrowing has increased in recent years. The state is precariously close to its borrowing limit. See
borrow
More examplesFewer examplesMany institutions rely on short-term borrowing.Borrowing costs have increased in recent months.The deficit is financed by borrowing from abroad.
